name: Evil Shooter: Killing The Zombies
description:
In this game you have to protect people from the un dead zombies. people are enjoying time in amusement park but sudden attack of zombies make them worry.
park has two gates and zombies cannot enter the park except these gates. you have to stop them from entering to the park but if they do try to kill them as early as possible before killing any of the citizen in the lands.
game have many levels each level completion unlock the next level. and number of zombies increases accordingly.
features:
- Different levels to unlock
- 3D artwork
- Indestructible experience
